alert.note: Alert for Genesee (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm with heavy rain will impact portions of eastern Genesee County through 530 PM EDT... At 437 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Byron, or near Batavia, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Batavia, Le Roy, Byron, Stafford and Bergen. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
